cancelOrder.title: Confirm Cancellation
cancelOrder.description: Are you sure you want to cancel this order? Once canceled, we'll create a support ticket to handle your refund.
cancelOrder.tellUsMorePlaceholder: eg; I purchased the 250ml shampoo bottle last week, but the pump isn't working properly and it's difficult to get the product out.

createVoucher.title: Create Voucher
createVoucher.description1: Redeem your loyalty points to generate a discount voucher.
createVoucher.description2: 10 loyalty points = 1 euro. Use your points to save on your next order!
createVoucher.notEnoughPoints: *You don't have enough points to redeem

success.title: Voucher Created Successfully!
success.description2: Use this voucher at checkout to save on your next order.

success.title: Pet Added Successfully!

deleteAccount.confirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
deleteAccount.confirmDescription: This action is permanent. All your saved information, including orders, loyalty points, and wishlist items, will be lost.

Start exploring and find the perfect products for your pet!

address.title: My Addresses
address.subtitle: Manage your addresses for faster checkout.
address.emptyDescription: You haven't saved any shipping or billing addresses yet. Add one now to speed up checkout and manage your orders more easily.

updatePassword.title: Update Password
updatePassword.description: Keep your account secure by setting a new password.
updatePassword.note1: You'll be logged out from all other devices.
updatePassword.note2: You'll need to sign in again with your new password.

errors.newMustDiffer: New password must differ from current.
errors.passwordRequirements: At least 8 characters, 1 number, 1 special character

emailNotifications.title: Email Notification Preferences
emailNotifications.description: Tell us what you'd like to hear from us. Stay updated with order alerts, promotions, and pet care tips â€” or keep it quiet. It's totally up to you.

orderUpdates.title: Order Updates
orderUpdates.description: Get important info like order confirmation, shipping, and delivery status. (Required)

refundStatus.title: Refund Status
refundStatus.description: Stay updated on the progress of your refund request

promotions.title: Promotions & Offers

productRecommendations.title: Product Recommendations

deleteAccount.title: Delete My Account
deleteAccount.warning: Deleting your account will remove all your data permanently.

support.title: Support & Refund
support.subtitle: Manage your cancellations, refund requests, and support tickets all in one place.

emptyState.title: No Support Tickets Yet
emptyState.description: You haven't created any support or refund requests yet. If you face any issue with your order, you can easily raise a ticket here and track it in real time.

messages.support1: Hi there! ðŸ‘‹ Thanks for contacting Biogance Support. I can see your order has already been dispatched. Please do not receive the package when it arrives. Once it is returned to us, we'll process your refund and credit the amount back to your wallet.
messages.customer1: Thank you for the quick response. How long does it usually take for the package to return to you?
messages.support2: Great question! ðŸ˜Š On average, returns take 3â€“5 business days depending on the courier. As soon as we receive the package at our facility, we'll notify you and begin the refund process immediately.
messages.customer2: That's clear. Will the refund be transferred directly to my bank account or just to my Biogance wallet?
messages.support3: For faster processing, refunds are first credited to your Biogance wallet balance ðŸ’³. From there, you can either keep it for your next purchase or request a transfer back to your original payment method.
messages.customer3: Okay, that works for me. Will I be notified when the refund is available in my wallet?
messages.support4: Absolutely âœ… You'll receive both an email notification and a dashboard update under 'Support & Refunds' once your refund is credited. No need to follow up â€” we'll keep you updated every step of the way.
messages.customer4: Perfect, thank you for the assistance. This feels very clear now.
messages.support5: You're most welcome! ðŸ˜Š Thank you for choosing Biogance. We're committed to ensuring you and your pets always get the best care. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out anytime.

ticket1.title: Order Refund
ticket1.description: I purchased the 250ml shampoo bottle last week, but the pump isn't working properly and it's difficult to get the product out.

ticket2.title: Request a Refund
ticket2.description: I ordered a Biogance shampoo but realized I picked the wrong variant. I'd like to request a refund for this order.

ticket3.title: Quality Issue
ticket3.description: The conditioner I received has an unusual texture and doesn't seem right. I'd like to request a replacement or refund.
